#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   cin.tie(false);
   ll t,n;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       ll s=1,num;
       cin>>n;
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
       {   
          cin>>num;
          s=((s%MOD)*(num%MOD))%MOD;
       }
       cout<<s<<endl;
   }
return 0;
}
